name: Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad Company's Tax Assessment
name_abbreviation: Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad's Tax Assessment

judges: Before Fell, Brown, Potter, Elkin and Stewart, JJ.
parties: Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad Company’s Tax Assessment

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Elkin,
Decree reversed and record remitted to the court below with same instructions as given, ante, p. 248, costs on.the appeal to this court to be paid by the appellees.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Elkin,

casebody.head_matter:
Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad Company’s Tax Assessment
March 29, 1909:
(No. 8).
Argued Feb. 23, 1909.
Appeal, No. 384, Jan. T., 1908, by The Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad Company, from order of C. P. Lackawanna Co,, Nov. T., 1907, No. 646, on appeal from tax assessment in the Matter of the Assessment of Land of The Delaware, Lackawanna & Western Railroad Company in Olyphant Borough.
Before Fell, Brown, Potter, Elkin and Stewart, JJ.
Reversed.
